categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Formmn Badees was a young Duros pilot who lived during Galactic Empire's reign.

Badees dreamed of joining the Rebel Alliance and flying a starfighter against the Empire. However, he had to settle for working in his older brother's repair facility, but he watched every holovid he could obtain that brought news of the Galactic Civil War.
